attributes.action: DCG Campaign (uk-dcg.com).  Re-engineer our divisive & unrepresentative system.
attributes.additional_details:
Divisive and confrontational politics will only continue to propagate division in the country.  Consider the strategy and 6 processes proposed for National Unity under a new devolved system of policy establishment described at uk-dcg.com.

A "stick with a tested system" will hardly be a satisfactory response - it has been tested and has failed.  All political commentators now regard the system as broken and that fundamental democratic change is necessary to restore public faith and engagement.
attributes.background: The root cause of the Brexit chaos is the policy gaps between the people, MP's and Parliament. The system is clearly unfit for purpose for a modern democracy and will not drive the unity necessary to restore the UK's image and drive our wealth in a competitive Post-Brexit trading environment.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you mean by DCG and what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
